To find the equation of the line:

Black Line represents the Line of Regression for TV Advertisements vs Sales
Red line represents the Line of Regression for Radio Advertisements vs Sales
Green Line represents the Line of Regression for Newspaper Advertisements vs Sales
Based on the graph, it's evident that radio advertising shows the highest effectiveness in
driving sales growth with increased expenditure, followed by newspaper ads. Conversely,
TV ads appear less effective, demanding higher expenditure for comparatively smaller
sales gains. The most dependable advertising avenue is newspaper advertising,
maintaining a consistent performance across all parameters. In summary, radio
advertising provides the best return on investment, while TV ads seem to yield lower
